title: Dev Tool
description: The ultimate landing page template for your developer tool.

body.raw: ### What is this? This is a landing page template for a developer tool. The template is built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion, optimized for showcasing developer tools and services. ### Who is this for? You are launching a new developer tool or service and need a professional, eye-catching landing page to showcase your product's features and attract developers. ### Why should I use this? - ✅ Save 500+ hours of work - ✅ No need to learn advanced animations - ✅ Easy to configure and change - ✅ 1-click download and setup - ✅ 5 minutes to update the text and images - ✅ Deploy live to Vercel ### Features - 1x Landing Page with 13 sections - Header Section - Hero Section - Logos Section - Examples Section - Use Cases Section - Features Section - Statistics Section - Testimonials Section - Pricing Section - Community Section - Blog Section - CTA Section - Footer Section - 1x Blog using MDX - Dark mode support - 100% Mobile responsive - Full SEO coverage - Dynamic OpenGraph images for every page - Tons of animations / micro-interactions - Clean and maintainable code - Global constants and variables for color, text, and more ### Dependencies - Next.js 15 - React 18.3 - TypeScript 5 - TailwindCSS 3.4 - Framer Motion 11.3 - next-themes 0.3.0 - radix-ui - shadcn/ui
